net.tridentsdk.world

Interface WorldBorder

  • Deprecated. 
    the world border is deprecated because the units which are used are unclear and are subject to change at any time. Use at your own risk.

    @ThreadSafe
 @Deprecated
public interface WorldBorder
    Access to the world border properties
    Since:
    0.4-alpha
    Author:
    The TridentSDK Team

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Pair<Integer,Integer> center()
      Deprecated. 
      Gets the position where the worldborder is centered
      int contractionTime()
      Deprecated. 
      Gets the time the border has to contract to the contraction target
      void modify(int mod, int time)
      Deprecated. 
      Modifies the border square's length and width
      void setCenter(int x, int z)
      Deprecated. 
      Sets the center X and Z coordinates for the border
      int size()
      Deprecated. 
      Gets the size of the worldborder
      int sizeContraction()
      Deprecated. 
      Gets to what size a border is contracting, 60000000 by default

    • Method Detail

      • size

        int size()
        Deprecated. 
        Gets the size of the worldborder
        Returns:
        The size of the worldborder

      • modify

        void modify(int mod,
            int time)
        Deprecated. 
        Modifies the border square's length and width
        Parameters:
        mod - a positive integer to indicate an expansion by that amount, a negative to indicate a regression by that amount
        time - the time over which the border will expand or contract, 0 to apply immediately

      • center

        Pair<Integer,Integer> center()
        Deprecated. 
        Gets the position where the worldborder is centered

        The returned immutable pair of integers represents the X and Y coordinates respectively

        Returns:
        The position where the worldborder is centered

      • setCenter

        void setCenter(int x,
               int z)
        Deprecated. 
        Sets the center X and Z coordinates for the border
        Parameters:
        x - the X coordinate
        z - the Z coordinate

      • sizeContraction

        int sizeContraction()
        Deprecated. 
        Gets to what size a border is contracting, 60000000 by default
        Returns:
        To what size a border is contracting, 60000000 by default

      • contractionTime

        int contractionTime()
        Deprecated. 
        Gets the time the border has to contract to the contraction target
        Returns:
        The time the border has to contract to the contraction target
